code: export class Heart{constructor(x,y){this.x=void 0;this.y=void 0;this.spawnTime=void 0;this.lifetime=5000;this.x=x;this.y=y;this.spawnTime=Date.now();}draw(ctx){ctx.font="20px Arial";ctx.textAlign="center";ctx.textBaseline="middle";ctx.fillText("üçÜ",this.x,this.y);}isExpired(){return Date.now()-this.spawnTime>this.lifetime;}}export class Buff extends Heart{drawBuff(ctx){ctx.font="20px Arial";ctx.textAlign="center";ctx.textBaseline="middle";ctx.fillText("üçë",this.x,this.y);}}
